Use limited consumables carefully, count your ammo, and be fast to survive the zombie raids that are getting harder every day!

Features

  • Realistic post-apocalyptic graphics
  • Strategy based 3rd person gameplay
  • Co-op Multiplayer for up to 4 players
  • immersive game
  • Game mechanics improvement.
  • 3 maps: İstanbul, Abu Dhabi, Moscow and more capitals

item.title: Martha's Dolls
item.description:
About This Game



Martha's Dolls is a first-person horror game where you play as a player who has ventured into an abandoned village rumored to be cursed by the haunted dolls of an old woman named Martha. The village is full of these dolls, and those who enter the village are never able to leave.

Your goal is to investigate the village and uncover the secrets behind Martha's dolls and the curse that plagues the village. However, you must be careful, as the dolls are not to be underestimated. They are said to be possessed by Martha's vengeful spirit, and they will stop at nothing to protect their village and its secrets.

As you explore the village, you will encounter a variety of different dolls, each with its own unique abilities and behaviors. Some dolls will simply wander the village, while others will actively hunt you down. You will need to use your wits and survival skills to avoid the dolls and stay alive.

In addition to the dolls, you will also need to be wary of the village itself. The village is full of traps and hazards, and it is easy to get lost in its maze-like streets. You will need to carefully navigate the village and avoid the traps in order to find your way out.

Martha's Dolls is a challenging and suspenseful horror game that will test your nerves. If you are looking for a truly terrifying experience, then Martha's Dolls is the game for you.



Here are some of the features of Martha's Dolls:

- Variety of different dolls, each with its own unique abilities and behaviors.
- Challenging and suspenseful horror experience.
- Maze-like village full of traps and hazards.
- Dark and atmospheric world to explore.
- Gripping story to uncover.
- Realistic Horror Experience !
- All what you need ( Inventory System , Player Items , Puzzles ...)


If you are a fan of horror games, then Martha's Dolls is a must-play. It is a truly terrifying and unforgettable experience.

item.title: Last Dino Standing
item.description:
About This Game

Last Dino Standing is a hand-drawn 2D casual game where your goal is just to stay alive avoiding the crazy elements that fall from the sky. You're the last Tyrannosaurus alive in the dinosaur extinction event. We already know how this story ends, but you need to survive as long as you can.

Main features:

  • Funny visuals.
  • Simple accurate movements.
  • 4 difficulty levels to choose from.
  • Timer system.
  • Map variations.

and more secrets to discover.

item.title: Evil Seal
item.description:
About This Game

Evil Seal is an action horror game inspired by the Apocalypse of St. John.



The story begins when the first of the Seven Seals is broken and the first of the Four Knights begin to spread confusion and destruction on Earth.
The new Messiah, the devil's son, manages to create a new religious cult by performing initial miracles, with many followers. The "miracle-people" discover the price they have to pay soon: a few months after the miracle, their bodies are emptied of all traces of humanity. The new religious order followers will be transformed into beings with no rationality or control, hungry for human flesh and incapable of feeling.



Adam is a man deeply in love with his sweet half, Eve. But fate is cruel: when the first seal of the apocalypse is broken, Eve is kidnapped by dark forces.

Thus, with a broken heart and an incredible determination, Adam embarks on a desperate journey to find the love of his life. Along the way, he will face epic challenges and unveil dark secrets, battling evil creatures and overcoming insurmountable obstacles.



A real estate agent, with a past in the marines, helps Adam to find Eve in a city devastated by demons and infernal creatures.
And the story continues...
What will happen when the other seals are broken?



This game is the first of a trilogy that provides for the breaking of the 7 seals of the apocalypse.



Raffaele Mandese created this video game entirely on his own, covering all aspects from graphics, gameplay, sounds, to the story. The team Mandese Games is the name of the team he formed, but currently, it only has him as a member.

item.title: KinitoPET
item.description:
About This Game

Join the Discord!

https://discord.gg/GZfJqdM7au

Enter the Everlasting Fun!

Would you like a friend? Yes? Well, I have something special for you.

KinitoPET invites you to their wonderfull world of fun and excitement!
Where he will be your very own virtual friend and personal helper! 


Kinito is able to walk, talk, browse, adapt, and play games as Kinito is like no other with its adaptive technology! Kinito is h̶i̶d̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶a̶ ̶d̶a̶r̶k̶ ̶s̶e̶c̶r̶e̶t a friend you'll never forget with its critically acclaimed react respond algorithm to make your experience in̶d̶e̶f̶i̶n̶i̶t̶e truly unique. Where d̶i̶d̶ he ̶g̶o else can you find a friend like Kinito with its multitude of great features and friendly love!

Kinito will be your friend and you can s̶t̶o̶p̶ ̶i̶t be there's!
So why wait as with your new virtual assistant and friend you can have f̶o̶r̶e̶v̶e̶r everlasting fun!

item.title: Elemental Engagements
item.description:
About This Game


Wield god powers and command legions of elemental thralls against your friends! Elemental Engagements is a split screen, versus, real-time-strategy game. Gain favor with the elemental gods to use their 16 powers, battle on 3 maps, and play with either Keyboard or Controller!

Elemental God Powers

As a major wind god, you'll wield wind powers. However, winning the favor of the other gods will grant you fire, water, and earth god powers.
Use wind to control the battlefield! Use fire to damage your opponent! Use water to support your units! Use earth to deny enemy movement!

Sacrifice and Gain Favor

As a match progresses, you can choose which elements you will sacrifice your thralls to. The more territory you capture, the more favor and god powers you will gain for the associated elements, but you can only have a limited amount! This means that no game will play the same and each player must choose their sacrifices wisely.

Pick Up & Play

Elemental Engagements is a progressively-faster paced game on match by match basis. This means that most matches will last 5-20 minutes. The controls are designed specifically for the gamepad and split-screen gameplay, so RTS veterans and casual players alike will find tons of fun and room to strategize!

item.title: RC Revolution: High Voltage - 免费玩
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into RC Revolution High Voltage, the exhilarating free version of RC Revolution

Select from three dynamic cars, unlock a fourth, and challenge our AI for a fifth. Customize for style and performance, and get ready for stunt-filled tracks and nitro-fueled speed craze. Your high-nitro adventure awaits!

Experience the Thrill of RC Revolution High Voltage

Discover RC Revolution High Voltage – the ultimate free RC racing adventure! Choose your car, master stunts, and unleash nitro speeds. This game blends strategy with exhilarating action, offering a unique, timeless racing experience. Dive into a world of speed, skill, and style!

Exhilarating Stunts and Individual Triumphs

Master extreme jumps, twists, and flips in this solo racing adventure. Customize for peak performance, conquer challenging tracks, and elevate your racing prowess. Every race is a chance to defy gravity and make your mark!

Exclusive Cars, Diverse Tracks, and Personalized Customization

Start with three specialized cars and unlock two more as you progress. Each track offers unique challenges to test your skills. Customize your select vehicles to match your racing style and see the impact on your track performance.

item.title: The Summit Library
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome, Keeper.



...To the wonders of the Summit Library; the largest and most important Library in the Eawin Empire. Your trade has been suffering under the rule of the current Emperor -- but with the Summit requesting your services things are looking up.

Except when you arrive you suddenly find yourself in a dangerous magical mystery. Something's wrong with the books, and the Library is falling apart at the seams.

Also, there might be a war? But the Summit Library is situated on neutral territory, so that doesn't affect you.

...Right?

As you set out the uncover the Library's secrets, you get drawn into the complexities of the Empire's politics; rebellion, betrayal, underground organisations, and more. Meet the various people residing at the Summit Library; make alliances and enemies; fall in love and get your heart broken.

Make choices that matter and explore all the multiple routes and endings, as well as the secrets you can record in your Codex.

May you live to see the end of this tale written.

*

Meet the Residents



Berit - the High Librarian
Overworked and underappreciated, Berit is slowly being crushed by the expectations put on her shoulders.



Aias - the Cynical Investigator
Standoffish and unfriendly, Aias doesn't seem to have much taste for his work, using his position as Librarian to discover hidden truths instead.



River - the Shrewd Politician
Calculating, charming, and a little too interested in the secrets of your trade, River's true intentions remain a mystery.



Yakyar - the Rebel Survivor
Escaping a bloody fate, Yakyar wields magic of their own -- and seems to know far more about yours than possible.



Thasar - the Runaway Soldier
Weary of killing and made bitter by the blood on his hands, all Thasar wants is to turn his back on the world.

*

Features

  • A magical mystery set in a fantasy-rich world
  • Choices that matter; have your actions and relationships with others shape the story
  • A customisable MC; choose your name, appearance, pronouns, and place of origin
  • A diverse LGBTQ+ cast
  • Collectible CGs
  • Unlockable information for your codex
  • Optional mature intimacy scenes

Content warnings:
Fantasy violence, death, blood, strong language, screenshakes, sexual themes and language.

This game will feature mature content and mature intimacy scenes in the future, and is intended for 18+ audiences. These scenes can always be skipped without penalty and are completely optional for gameplay.

Currently Chapter 1 is out and free to play! Check back soon for the next installment.

item.title: My Lovey-Dovey Demon
item.description:
About This Game



Taiki is your average guy. He’s nineteen years old, in his first year of university, and he’s just starting to learn what it means to be an adult.

During the summer vacation, Taiki goes to the countryside to stay with his grandparents alongside his siblings: the haughty, fashionable Chiharu; the tomboyish troublemaker Nene; and the sweet, shy Reza.

Taiki wants to have a relaxing summer, but his hopes are dashed when Nene breaks into their grandfather’s study, which is strictly out of bounds. Inside his study, Nene finds a treasure trove of dusty old books, including a tome full of instructions on how to summon demons.

Nene sets about this demonic summoning ritual at once, and calls upon a fearsome figure from the deepest, darkest depths of Hell…

Who just so happens to be a cute girl with pink hair and an impressive bust?!

Now Taiki’s in a real pinch. Not only does he have to look after his siblings, but he also has his demonic guest, Elisabeth, to worry about – and she’s completely besotted with him! What in the world is Taiki going to do now?!



  • 80k of text (approx 4-6 hours of reading)
  • A kinetic story with no choices or branches
  • Detailed character artwork
  • A lot of pretty backgrounds of the Japanese countryside
  • A soothing OST
  • A very cute demon girl
  • A light, sweet, fluffy romance story!

item.title: Mystic Strife
item.description:
About This Game



Mystic Strife is a fast-paced chaotic party fighting game for up to eight friends. Choose one of six characters with unique abilities and prepare yourself for a simple yet surprisingly deep platforming deathmatch!

Characters:

  • Ranger: Equipped with a bow and three recoverable arrows.
  • Wizard: Slings a torrent of fireballs and can cast a powerful long-range magic beam.
  • Necromancer: Raises the dead to muster a legion of skeletons that persist through rounds.
  • Rogue: Eqipped with a hookshot to quickly manuever around the stage and to pull in her foes.
  • Engineer: Equiped with a reloadable musket and can build repairable turrets.
  • Dragoon: Weilding a lance, she can take to the skies with a mighty leap and come crashing down with a powerful shockwave.

Key Features:

  • Tight platforming controls that are simple to learn, hard to master.
  • Deflect physical projectiles back at your opponents with a well-timed strike.
  • Pick up various powerups like shields, speed boosts and more.
  • Six unique characters.
  • Nine playable stages.

PLEASE NOTE: This game has no single-player content. It must be played with your buddies IRL or through Steam Remote Play. (Buddies not included)

item.title: Tick, Tank, Boom
item.description:
About This Game

Tick, Tank, Boom is an arcade multiplayer-shooter where players fight each other in various game modes like free for all, domination or capture the flag. A large selection of tanks will give you everything you need to find your perfect playstyle to succeed on the battlefield.




In Tick, Tank, Boom you battle other players from around the world online, or host a LAN party with your friends - the choice is yours! With a large selection of game modes and custom rule settings, you can have exactly the experience you want.

item.title: Hertz
item.description:
About This Game



Launch into a relentless roguelike action experience in this top-down shooter with bombs!

In a robotic world, control Lizzy and their band of unlockable beasty bots, each hungry for upgrades to enhance their abilities. However, the precious resources required are guarded by Steel Sentinels, guardians of the arena. Your mission is to outmaneuver these sentinels, collect valuable upgrades, and create powerful, game-changing synergies. Will you outsmart these mechanical wardens and survive the treacherous arena to build the ultimate beasty bot?

FEATURES

  • Many weapons: bombs, mines, missiles, and special bullet ammunition types like metal, poison, fire, and ice.
  • Resource gathering: Destroy enemies and breakable blocks to get resources necessary to upgrade your animal bot.
  • Customizable Upgrades: Combine over 60+ unique upgrades for powerful and diverse gameplay strategies.
  • Varied Encounters: Experience diverse gameplay with randomized enemy types, spawn points, and resource distribution within levels, creating unique encounters each playthrough.

LIZZY BOT

BAMBI BOT (unlockable)

FOXY BOT (unlockable)

RABBY BOT (unlockable)

item.title: We Need More Steam!
item.description:
About This Game

Build and design your power plant for the town. The demand for electricity is constantly increasing, and you are tasked with supplying that power. Turn water into steam and steam into electricity with the use of water pumps, boilers, tanks, and nuclear reactors.

Each town has different demands and a limited amount of space to build your power plant. Planning ahead is necessary as you manage space, money, and supply versus demand of electricity.

Unlock each level by meeting the town's electricity demands and scoring enough to satisfy the endless demand for power.

item.title: Splat!
item.description:
About This Game

Character, Story, Lore, the building blocks of every great game...
But that's really hard to make.

SPLAT! Race your way your down a series of increasingly difficult levels avoiding obstacles and trying to reach the end without going Splat!

Gameplay:
You fall through levels avoiding obstacles, and using powerups to try and reach the end. There are no lives but if you don't beat the level before the time runs out you lose. Obstacles may move and trick you so be careful where you aim!

Once the game is complete you can replay all levels and try and beat your best scores!

item.title: Shooter for Dummies
item.description:
About This Game

Shooter for Dummies puts players in the perspective of a dummy. Play the most iconic FPS PvP maps: CTF, Team Deathmatch, Kill confirmed... where the winning is not the common goal: The dummy with less receiving damage wins! But don't worry dummies, you can punch players almost off the map!

Play in teams of 5 players to the different game modes:
  • Capture the flag
  • Team deatchmatch
  • Rush
  • Kill confirmed
  • Conquest
  • King of the hill

There are always 2 ways to finnish a map: by completing the map objectives, or after 5 minutes of game. Dummies, you are the target! Only you can score for your team, and also your health is the most important element on this game. Avoid taking damange, don't let the players attack you!

Players, you are not forgotten either. You will have access to a set of temporal bonus abilities both, to attack and protect the dummies... or the other players... Use of the 4 characters and demonstrate your FPS skills on this game changing experience.

Shooter for Dummies does never ends as it starts! Tactics and strategy will be more important than ever to win.

item.title: Santa's Gift Grab
item.description:
About This Game



Santa Gift Grab: Step into a snowy world with our straightforward collector's game. Featuring clean low-poly graphics and soothing Christmas tunes, your task is to help Santa gather his misplaced gifts. But be quick! Time is running out. Can you collect them all?

Features:
• 3 Levels - Play through 3 levels with increasing difficulty.
• Cookies - Collect cookies to ensure you don't run out of time.
• Gifts - Gather all of Santa's gifts to complete each level.

item.title: RAID: Shadow Legends
item.description:
About This Game

The realm of Teleria trembles beneath the shadow of the Dark Lord Siroth. You have been called upon by the Arbiter, the immortal guardian of Teleria, to stop him. Heed the call!

Dive into a deep turn-based RPG with 8 exciting game modes and extensive character customization. Enjoy a story-driven campaign, competitive PvP clashes with players from across the world, and constant new challenges with our stream of updates.

KEY GAME FEATURES

SUMMON 800+ CHAMPIONS


Collect hundreds of unique Champions from 15 playable factions and combine them into unstoppable teams to take down your enemies. Dark elves, Ogryn warlords, Lizardmen, and more can all join your ranks – if you earn their loyalty.

MASTER TACTICAL TURN-BASED GAMEPLAY


Kit out your Champions with epic gear you loot along the way and customize their masteries for millions of possible builds. Level up your team and play them your way, unleashing a barrage of powerful skills and game-changing support abilities.

PROVE YOURSELF IN 3 PvP MODES


Enter the Arena and go head-to-head with other players to unlock special gear and climb up the leaderboards. Then, really put your skills to the test in real-time PvP battles with Live Arena.

EXPLORE ENGAGING PvE CONTENT


Tear your way through a visually stunning campaign accompanied by a rich, fully-voiced dark fantasy narrative. Conquer the forces of Darkness as well as 13 challenging Dungeon bosses, fast-paced Faction Wars, and the notorious Doom Tower to earn valuable loot.

TEAM UP WITH FRIENDS


Join forces with your fellow players to take on Clan Bosses for exclusive gear, Shards to summon new Champions, and more. Once you’re strong enough, you can also compete against 4 other Clans in the epic Hydra Clash.

GET LOST IN THE LORE


Learn about the inhabitants of Teleria through their unique backstories as well as the world itself. Immerse yourself even further by checking out the animated limited series RAID: Call of the Arbiter on YouTube.

item.title: SAMUZA
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the world of SAMUZA!

In this time attack obstacle course game, you play as one of the "SAMUZA" series of robots who tries to restore the lost world by finding it's allies.

Story
The year is 299X. Humanity has perished, and the world is ruled by a runaway artificial intelligence.
Foreseeing the end, the last Engineer made 9 keys, each with a piece of code, to be used when all else failed to restore the world to it's prevous state.
You are Humanity's last hope, the robot series "Samuza-L800". You must find the 9 special robots scattered around the world and collect their keys.
The ruling AI will surely interfere. You must overcome it's traps, collect the keys and use their combined code to reset the world.
I wish you luck!

Gameplay

Compete in several game modes with different levels from the game's story and the community.
Each level has a track you must complete while avoiding a series of obstacles.

Story Mode
The game's story campaign. Complete a series of premade levels and unlock new blocks to use in your creations.



Endless Mode
Complete random community made levels. Be careful not to fall off the course, as you will lose one life each time you reset. See how far you can go!

Search Mode
Use this to find community made levels. Use a code to find specific levels or follow other creators to easilly find their levels.



2P Versus Mode
Play with your friends in split screen local multiplayer.
You will get random levels from the community. In this mode there are no lives, have fun with your friends any way you want to.

2P Search Mode
Play any specific level with a friend in split screen local multiplayer.
Here you can search and play community made levels.
You can play against your friends on the levels you created! Prepare a difficult course and compete against your friends!

Creator Mode

Make your own content!
You can create your own original levels in the Creator Mode!
Here you can choose from a collection of blocks and combine them to make your unique levels.
Unlock new blocks by playing the Story Campaign and Endless Modes!

Build at your pace
Take your time in the creator mode. Test your progress at any time inside the Creator.
Save your progress locally or to your account. Once complete, you can upload your levels and share them with your friends and the community!
Let everyone around the world play in your original levels!

item.title: Rogue Frontiers
item.description:
About This Game


Embark on a bone-chilling journey of survival and terror with your comrades, as you traverse a perilous realm filled with unfathomable horrors lurking in every corner. Brace yourself for heart-pumping battles against bloodthirsty beasts, honing your skills and mastering your craft to emerge victorious in the face of insurmountable odds.

With every step you take, you'll encounter diverse locales, each more treacherous than the last, and daunting obstacles that will test your mettle to the core. But you'll have no choice but to press on, constructing an unbreachable fortress to shield you from the darkness that threatens to consume you.

And yet, even your fortress may not be enough to withstand the unrelenting onslaught of your foes. You must hone your tactics, refine your strategy, and outwit the most cunning of enemies if you hope to survive.

In Rogue Frontiers, there is no room for error. Every decision you make could mean the difference between life and death. But with each victory, you'll grow stronger, more resilient, and better equipped to face the next challenge.

And with frequent updates featuring bug fixes, balance adjustments, and fresh content drops, Rogue Frontiers is an ever-evolving nightmare, where your feedback and input will help shape the future of the game. So join the fray now, and leave your mark on the annals of horror gaming forever. But be warned: once you enter, there may be no escape.

EXPLORE THE WORLD

Unleash your sense of adventure and step into a world steeped in mystery and intrigue. Explore a vast and varied landscape, brimming with dangerous foes to conquer, precious resources to gather, and hidden secrets to uncover.

Prepare to battle bloodthirsty monsters at every turn, as you journey through treacherous terrain, encountering unique adversaries with their own deadly abilities and cunning tactics. Only the bravest and most skilled adventurers will survive the perils that lie ahead.

But the greatest rewards await those who dare to venture into the most perilous dungeons, facing the most challenging creatures in their quest for glory. These ancient, labyrinthine tombs are filled with untold riches, rare artifacts, and coveted crafting recipes, but they are also home to the deadliest monsters in the land.

Surviving these harrowing encounters will require every ounce of skill and strategy you possess, as you adapt to ever-changing circumstances and employ every weapon in your arsenal. Only those with the courage and fortitude to persevere will emerge victorious, earning their place among the greatest adventurers of all time.

So prepare to immerse yourself in a world of endless possibility, where danger and reward go hand in hand. Gather your wits, arm yourself to the teeth, and embark on a journey unlike any other. The fate of the realm rests in your hands.

DEFEND YOUR STRONGHOLD
Forge unbreakable fortresses, the last bastion of hope in a world teeming with danger and chaos. With a comprehensive building system, you can personalize both the interior and exterior of your structures, creating a safe haven from the perils that lie ahead.

But it won't be easy. As you advance through building tiers, enhancing and expanding your stronghold, you'll have to stay one step ahead of the hostile Horde, who launch regular assaults on your base.

To fend off these relentless attackers, you'll need to construct traps and defensive structures that will keep them at bay. Every decision you make could mean the difference between life and death, so you'll need to employ all your ingenuity and strategic thinking to survive.

But the rewards are worth the risk. With every upgrade to your fortress, you'll become stronger, more resilient, and better able to withstand the onslaught of your enemies. And as you progress through the game, you'll unlock new and more powerful building options, allowing you to customize your stronghold to suit your playstyle.

So gather your materials, fire up your imagination, and set to work building the ultimate fortress. The Horde may be relentless, but with the right combination of traps and defensive structures, you can hold them off indefinitely. Do you have what it takes to survive in this hostile world? The fate of your fortress, and your survival, rests in your hands.

GATHER, CRAFT AND SURVIVE
Survival is the name of the game in this harsh and unforgiving world, and you'll need all your wits and resourcefulness to make it through each day. Collect materials from the environment and fashion them into weapons, armor, tools, and defenses that will help you stay alive and fend off the dangers that lurk around every corner.

But survival isn't just about brute strength and firepower. You'll need to be able to cultivate crops and vegetables, cook food, concoct drinks and potions, and upgrade your living space to create a safe and comfortable haven in this hostile world.

As you progress through the game, you'll face more formidable foes, and you'll need to discover new items to craft in order to stay ahead of the game. With each new challenge you overcome, you'll gain experience and become more skilled at gathering, crafting, and surviving.

But be warned: the challenges will be many, and the stakes will be high. You'll need to be able to adapt quickly to changing circumstances and make split-second decisions that could mean the difference between life and death.

So strap on your boots, grab your tools, and get ready for an unparalleled experience of gathering, crafting, and survival. This world is unforgiving, but with the right combination of skill, luck, and determination, you just might make it out alive.

KEY FEATURES:
  • Venture forth into an enormous, meticulously crafted world where every locale boasts a distinct ambience, unique foes, and resources.
  • Embark on your odyssey solo or team up with up to 32 players on player-hosted servers and brace yourself for scaling enemy difficulty.
  • Explore extraordinary biomes, each offering its own special ingredients to gather, monsters to battle, and dungeons to delve into.
  • Indulge in a highly detailed crafting system where you can hone your skills and create hundreds of items, unlocking endless possibilities.
  • Choose from dozens of weapons and armor types, progressing through various tiers as you journey through the world.
  • Immerse yourself in stamina-based combat that rewards preparation and skill. Utilize weapon types with unique attacks, different blocking styles, ranged combat, dodges, and parries to combat your enemies.
  • Fuel your adventure with a rewarding food system where you gain health, stamina, and regeneration buffs depending on the foods you consume.
  • Experience a flexible building system that takes structural integrity into account, allowing you to create anything from a small shelter to an entire village, claim abandoned buildings as your own, and customize them to your liking.
  • Protect your base from the Horde, who will launch attacks on all your bases. Or, make sacrifices to them beforehand and they will skip an attack, adding a whole new level of strategic gameplay. Get ready for the ultimate survival adventure!

item.title: Zombie Party 丧尸派对
item.description:
About This Game

"Zombie Party" is an anti-superhero-themed strategy game. You need to play the role of a chaotic ability user GRAVEDIGGER, and use your super power to summon the zombie army to destroy the land that is governed by the government and the PARLIAMENT OF FIVE, The established order of power.




You can use your superpowers to summon thousands of zombies and form an army of the living dead loyal to you. But be aware that once summoned, most of them will tend to act according to their bloodthirsty instincts. At this time, you need to summon more powerful special infected. They will perform their respective duties and become an important aid for you to fight against the enemy.




Using your powerful Chaos abilities on the battlefield, whether it is to amplify friendly troops or let them self-destruct and damage enemies, will have a vital impact on the entire battle situation.




In a secret corner where no one is watching, you will build a refuge for those with super powers. Configure upgrade modules for various instruments and buildings to make your abilities more powerful




The conflict and hatred could no longer be suppressed. He embarked on the road of revenge and fought fiercely with more than a dozen heroes. Become a [gravedigger] to destroy all this hypocrisy and injustice, and sound the death knell for the sanctimonious superhero.

item.title: Primateria
item.description:
About This Game



Embark on an epic journey in Primateria, a game redefining the roguelike deckbuilder with a nod to classic Yu-Gi-Oh! experience. Fuse cards, battle divine beings, and navigate through a universe teeming with challenges and surprises. Embrace the thrill of endless combinations and tactical depths.

Features


  • Revolutionary Infinite Fusion: Primateria redefines deck-building with its innovative infinite fusion system. You can infinitely merge cards to create more potent tokens, breaking free from the confines of traditional turn-based mechanics. This system, while drawing inspiration from classics like Yu-Gi-Oh!, introduces a distinct and innovative twist.

  • Unleash High Attack Combos: Primateria empowers you to unleash powerful combo attacks through the unique abilities of each card, providing a thrilling and satisfying gameplay experience that captures the essence of the most dramatic moments in card battle games.

  • Strategic Fusion Summoning: Elevate your summoning tactics by perfectly matching levels for fusion. Every decision you make, every move you plan, becomes a crucial part of your strategic journey, demanding your tactical foresight and mastery.

  • Balanced Risk and Reward with Card Devolution: Face the unique challenge where high-level cards, upon defeat, transform back into their original forms rather than being destroyed. This balanced risk-reward system keeps your strategic play dynamic and engaging, constantly calling for your tactical adaptability.

  • Adaptive Mana Pool System: Primateria introduces a unique mana pool system tied to the fusion mechanic. This system doesn’t just govern card play but also powers up your special abilities, adding an additional layer of strategy to your gameplay.

  • “Dual Graveyard” Dynamics: Primateria introduces a dual graveyard system – the "Damage Pile" and "Discard Pile," adding complexity to the management of defeated and discarded cards and introducing a new strategic element to the gameplay.

  • Protection & Repositioning Mechanic: The game's design incorporates frontline and backline battle dynamics, forcing you to think critically about card placement and repositioning strategies, enhancing the depth of tactical play.

  • Rich, Expansive Universe: Set in a beautifully crafted world, Primateria offers a narrative-rich experience. Players, as "Polupus," embark on a journey filled with divine entities and mythical challenges, making each playthrough not just a game but a story unfolding.

  • Roguelike Elements for Endless Replayability: With a variety of relics, consumables, and ever-changing maps, the game offers you immense replayability, ensuring that no two playthroughs are the same.

  • Almighty Legendary Cards: To make playing cards even more exciting, new legendary cards can be summoned by fulfilling very specific conditions and challenges during a run. These incredibly powerful cards have amazing new art and represent the divine characters in the game.

Here's some of the new and exciting things you can expect on the full game:

  • A complete story mode with 9 unique quests, a thrilling story and a bunch of characters!
  • 100+ cards, with hundreds of effects, mechanics and endless combos!
  • 43 Steam achievements for you to challenge yourselves and unlock!
  • 12 unique pre-built decks with specific archetypes for you to explore, including a Random Deck for experienced players to challenge their might!
  • 20+ special items that can be found and used in runs to enhance your chances of reaching the surface!
  • 10+ challenging nodes for exploration!
  • A new and improved Endless Mode with challenging bosses, enemy encounters, exploration and much more!
  • A gallery system that serves as a compendium for all cards, items and unlockables in the game so you can track your progress!
  • A meta-progression system that allows you to gain experience, level up, and unlock all sorts of magical items and cards for your Primateria journey!
  • And much, much more!

item.title: Before The Sun Rises
item.description:
About This Game

Before the Sun Rises is a 3D exploration and platform game about connection with nature and others. You play as a water drop, born from the misty dew of dawn. Can you restore the forest of your birth before the sun rises?

In single player, explore the landscape to find and collect the water that you need to bloom trees and move onto the next area. In multiplayer, connect with friends or strangers online, help each other find water sources, and work together to restore the forest!

NOTE: The current version of Before the Sun Rises is a demo and work in progress. While multiplayer is available, it is still being tested and is currently in beta.

item.title: SEARCH ALL - FLIES
item.description:
About This Game

SEARCH ALL - FLIES

is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the flies in a large location. The flies will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks lively because of the animation elements. Find all the flies! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- 100 flies to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!

item.title: Searching For Rest
item.description:
About This Game

When you died your body could not be found, a funeral was held and an empty casket was lowered into your grave. Many years later your soul has brought you back from death to finally find eternal rest.

50+ Unlocks
Advance your Necropolis and unlock game altering upgrades as you play. Discover Curses that influence your gameplay in different ways.



Strategic Gameplay
Fight fearsome foes and gain unique abilities each time you venture through the cemetery. Uncover the mystery of your unending search and fight powerful bosses in the Catacombs.

Deckbuilding and Upgrades
Create the perfect graveyard and obtain powerful upgrades on your search for rest. Mix and match different upgrades each time you play to create unstoppable builds.

item.title: Chat Guess Games
item.description:
About This Game

Chat Guess Games is a community game for Twitch Streamers. A game for your community to battle it out and see who truly knows the most about video games!

Screenshots, artwork, genres, release year and more are displayed on screen and chat races to guess the correct game first!

  • Rounds can be started with chat commands, from within the game, or users can use their channel points to redeem a round.
  • Autoplay mode where the rounds keep coming, perfect for engaging viewers during breaks.
  • Channel Leaderboards to encourage competition in your community and Global Leaderboards to compete against other channels and see which community is best at game trivia.
